thread.title: Jenna Jameson compares Muslims to the KKK in explosive Twitter rant
thread.title_full: Jenna Jameson compares Muslims to the KKK in explosive Twitter rant

title: Jenna Jameson compares Muslims to the KKK in explosive Twitter rant
text:
Jenna Jameson compares Muslims to the KKK in explosive Twitter rant Former adult film star Jenna Jameson went on an anti-Muslim tirade on Twitter on Tuesday night in which she compared Muslims to the Klu Klux Klan and defended Milo Yiannopoulos.
Jameson, who is currently expecting her third child and recently converted to Judaism, lashed out in a string of tweets that lasted almost four hours. 
SEE ALSO: 'Fixer Upper' stars Chip and Joanna Gaines reveal where they're considering moving to 
"Do te klu klux klan follow a religion that orders deaths of apostates?" she asked in response to someone's since-deleted tweet. "When was the last time we saw a klan member blow up infidels?"
In response to someone who said "that doesn't make all Muslims bad," Jameson made a sweeping statement about the religion.
See her tweets below: 

"I disagree with following an ideology that abuses women, kills gays, mutilates female children and murders apostates," she said.
Her tirade wasn't taken lightly by Twitter users, who called out her generalizing words. When someone urged her to "stop putting all Muslims in the same package," she responded with another big statement.
"Even moderate Muslims believe homosexuality is a criminal offense, polygamy is the norm, women are considered animals," she proclaimed. "Shall I go on?"
See photos of Jenna Jameson through the years:
